QuestData.Title: The Codex of Shadows
QuestData.Description: <This elaborate book contains hundreds of vellum pages bound within a slate cover. It's written in many languages, most unfamiliar. Carefully inked illustrations depict sorcerers or even entire buildings vanishing into curtains of shadow.>$B$B<Many illustrations depict magical artifices like those you see around camp. You suspect the dragon Sethria is trying to keep something hidden. Thisalee will want to hear about this!>
QuestData.LogDescription: Report what you've discovered to Thisalee Crow at Sethria's Roost in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report what you've discovered to Thisalee Crow at Sethria's Roost in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: They're doing what?$B$BThey're cloaking something? Of course - so our aerial scouts can't see anything with our eagle-eyes!
